metadata.title: CVE-2017-17530 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: common/help.c in Geomview 1.9.5 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: geomview package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
